metadata.title: CVE-2019-17362 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In LibTomCrypt through 1.18.2, the der_decode_utf8_string function (inder_decode_utf8_string.c) does not properly detect certain invalid UTF-8sequences. This allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and crash) or read information from othermemory locations via carefully crafted DER-encoded data.

criterions.comment: libtomcrypt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
